attributes.action: Let the public choose between leaving the EU with the PMs Deal or a No Deal
attributes.additional_details: Recent votes by MPs have not produced a result so let all of the people vote to reach a decision, MPs and Peers will be able to vote along with the rest of us, this way everyone has a say in our future. But as the referendum reached the decision to leave the only choice on the peoples vote should be to leave with the deal on the table or no deal
attributes.background:
We the people voted to leave the EU, we the people should choose if it is with the deal the EU are putting forward or with a no deal.
We did not vote to give the MPs the final decision, and they are now unable to, so give the decision back to the people
